properties.credits: Dr. Rosanne Birney, Dr. T.J. McDonald, WIT

title: NoSQL Databases
objectives: Lab work for the NoSQL Databases module

los.title: MongoDB installation
los.objectives: This lecture introduces MongoDB, the NoSQL database that we will use in forthcoming labs.

los.title: Install MongoDB
los.objectives: In this lab, we will install and test MongoDB, a non-relational database.

topics.title: CRUD: Create
topics.objectives: In this lab, we will explore the syntax used to create MongoDB structures.

los.title: Create
los.objectives: This lab introduces the CREATE functions in MongoDB.
